description.en:
A mysterious robot “Rokurou”, who speaks the Kansai dialect, suddenly appears in front of Shouta, a withdrawn high school student with no motivation and no friends. When Shouta's “motivation” increases, the two combine to become a hero!? 

The curtain opens on this cowardly boy's hero story!!
___
**Additional Buy Links:**
- Original 2011 Volume 1: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/406371277X), [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/501008731)
- Original 2011 Volume 2: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4063712931), [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/501008732)
description.ja:
やる気無し、友達無しの引きこもり高校生・三義正太の元に突然、持ち込まれた人工知能兵器『禄郎』! 無理矢理禄郎とタッグを組まされた正太は、引きこもりかえあヒーローへと華麗な変身を遂げる――か!?

引きこもりの少年・正太の前に突如現れたのは、ビミョーな関西弁を操る謎のロボット「禄郎」。正太の“やる気”が高まったとき、二人は合体し、ヒーロー「ゼノナイン」となる! 弱虫の弱虫による弱虫のための英雄がここに誕生!!
